name: REMNANTS IN THE SAND
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~

Our journey takes place in a post apocalyptic world that's been taken over by robots. Humankind as we know it has been in hiding, living in poor conditions trying to stay clear from the robots' watchful eye.

You play as Arlo, a brave kid who's camp has been destroyed by the robots, leaving him the only survivor.

Left on his own, Arlo has no choice but to venture into enemies' territory in the hopes of finding other human survivors.

In this 3rd person adventure you will explore the vast dunes, face the frightening mechanical guardians and find remnants of humanity in the sand.

~~~~~~~~~~~~
